description: Variation of condition 10  (to change the amount and frequency of access to the school entrance along Sheringham Road ) of previously approved planning permission ref P051450 dated 23 January 2006 for the Erection of a new school for 5-18 year olds and an Early Years Centre. The school is to accommodate approximately 1150 secondary students and 210 primary and infants, with associated playgrounds and landscaping. The scheme would involve demolition of the existing buildings on the site, and selected felling of existing trees. The scheme would comprise the main entrance to the secondary school on Liverpool Road with a new building on this frontage having a height of 14.5 metres above basement plus roof top multi-use games area with enclosure. Buildings fronting Bride Street are part 3 and part 4 storeys with the building on the Lough Road frontage of 2 storeys above basement. The entrance to the Early Years Centre is provided on Bride Street and the entrance to the Primary School is on Lough Road.
